body:
Heyo! Yesterday afternoon when i was playing I saw a thing at "Ctw01". When the other team picked up the wool I recieved a notification saying it. My final opinion is removing the touches of the other team because that isn't a essential info. If the defenders don't know if the rushers are at the wool the match will be more intense. Gimme your feedback and why do you like/don't like it.
Bye ;)

title: [SUG] Removing the another team touches
